description.lang: Aeotec Smart Dimmer 6 is a low-cost Z-Wave Dimmer plug-in module specifically used to enable Z-Wave command and control (on/off/dim) of any plug-in tool. It can report immediate wattage consumption or kWh energy usage over a period of time. In the event of power failure, non-volatile memory retains all programmed information relating to the units operating status.Its surface has a Smart RGB LED, which can be used for indicating the output load status or strength of the wireless signal. You can configure its indication colour according to your favour.The Smart Dimmer 6 is also a security Z-Wave device and supports Over The Air (OTA) feature for the products firmware upgrade.
Z-Wave Plus LifelineThe Basic Report CC and Hail CC (configured by parameter 80) can be sent to this association group.
The Basic Set and Switch Multilevel CC will be sent to the associated nodes in this group when the Smart Dimmer 6 receives the Basic Set or SwitchMultilevel CC from the main controller.

name.lang: Make Dimmer blink

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the Smart Dimmer to start the blinking state.
Specify the time of Dimmer blinking.

description.lang: Configure the output load status after re-power on.

Enable/disable the Configuration parameters to be Locked.

description.lang: Enable/disable the Configuration parameters to be Locked.

description.lang: Set the Device tag for Smart Dimmer 6

name.lang: Reset the Smart Dimmer 6

description.lang: Reset all configuration parameters to factory default setting
Reset Smart Dimmer 6 to factory default setting and exclude from the network

name.lang: Current overload protection

description.lang: When this parameter is enabled,the output Load will be turned off automatically when the Current overrun 2.6A and the time more than 2 minutes.

name.lang: Set the RGB LED color value for factory testing.

description.lang: Set the RGB LED color value for factory testing.Note: this is a Set-only parameter.

name.lang: To set which notification report can be sent to associated Nodes in association Group 1

description.lang: To set which notification report can be sent to associated Nodes in association Group 1 when the state of Smart Dimmers load is changed
Send Hail CC when using Action Button to change the output load state.

name.lang: Configure the state of LED

description.lang: Configure the state of LED when it is in Energy mode, Momentary indicate mode or N ight light mode.
Energy mode, the LED will follow the status (on/off) of its load
Momentary indicate mode, when the state of Dimmers load changed, The LED will follow the status (on/off) of its load, but the LED will turn off after 5 seconds if there is no any switch action.

name.lang: Configure the RGB value when it is in Night light mode.

description.lang: Configure the RGB value when it is in Night light mode.

name.lang: Configure the brightness level of RGB LED (0%-100%) when it is in Energy Mode/momentary indicate mode.

description.lang: Configure the brightness level of RGB LED (0%-99%) when it is in Energy Mode/momentary indicate mode.
The brightness level of Green color
The brightness level of Yellow color
The brightness level of Red color

name.lang: Enable or disable the parameter 91 and 92

description.lang: Enable or disable the parameter 91 and 92.

name.lang: Minimum change in wattage (in terms of wattage) to induce a Meter Report

description.lang: The value here represents minimum change in wattage (in terms of wattage) to induce a Meter Report.

name.lang: Minimum change in wattage percent (in terms of percentage) to induce a Meter Report

description.lang: The value here represents minimum change in wattage percent (in terms of percentage) to induce a Meter Report.
